snippet: Seven Florida teachers have brought a federal lawsuit to protest job evaluation policies that tether individual performance ratings to the test scores of students who are not even in their classes.
abstract: Seven Florida teachers bring federal lawsuit to protest job evaluation policies that tether individual performance ratings to test scores of students who are not even in their classes.
lead_paragraph: Seven Florida teachers have brought a federal lawsuit to protest job evaluation policies that tether individual performance ratings to the test scores of students who are not even in their classes.

headline.main: Florida: Teachers Sue Over Evaluation System
